===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|geography}} The [[Tong]] or [[Tongguan]] [[pass|Pass]] in the [[Qin]] [[mountains|Mountains]], a [[strategic]] [[point]] [[former]]ly [[control]]ling [[access]] between the [[North China Plain]] and the [[Wei]] [[valley|Valley]] and [[upper]] [[reaches]] of the [[Yellow River]].
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Tongguan]] (潼關[[古]][[城]]), the [[historic]] [[district]] [[preserving]] the [[ruins]] of the [[old]] [[city]] [[guard]]ing the [[pass]].
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Tongguan]] [[county|County]] (潼關[[縣]]) in [[Shaanxi]], [[China]], [[administer]]ed as [[part]] of the [[prefecture]]-[[level]] [[city]] of [[Weinan]].
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Tongguan]] (潼關[[縣]]), the [[county]]'s [[eponymous]] [[seat of government]].
